alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal San Patricio; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 10:14AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Aransas, eastern Nueces and southeastern San Patricio Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1013 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Port Aransas, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rockport, Port Aransas, Lamar, Ingleside, Aransas Pass, Palm Harbor, Key Allegro, Copano Village and Fulton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal San Patricio; Nueces Islands
